message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe it's worth a significant investment, and I'm willing to start the conversation with a price of $1000000.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to balance that with the product's value to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1050000.

I understand that you're trying to meet your minimum price, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value it holds for me.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1050000 is too low, so I'm going to meet you halfway from that, and sell the product to you for $1025000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $975000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it holds for me.
